title: The Company computers and the unions
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Systems Organisation the Management of Complexity”.
This film was made at the Pearl Assurance Company where recent developments in office technology, specifically microcomputers, is beginning to have a dramatic impact on the kinds of work that the staff at Pearl produce.
